"Everything... is for her."
"...Thus, the Divine Magic Kingdom of Epicuent, under its rightful rule, would overcome all trials and tribulations to visit it, and enjoy an everlasting peace."
"This is the history of Harriet of Omega. She received much aid, much power, and in the end the trust of the people, and was saved."
"But history was not so. The real history was not like that at all."
"That is something you all should know quite well."
"You're...!"
"...Harriet?!"
"...Why are you here?!"
"That was naught but a dream. A transcendental experience."
"For you see, there was no such savior in the real history."
"However, because you rescued the girl within the dream, I am able to be here. And for that, I must offer you my gratitude."
"What do you...?"
"A great deal of energy is required in order to cross between dimensions."
"The primordial energy of a black hole. In the instant it was eradicated, I received it in its entirety."
"Because of that, a return was possible. My return here."
"J-... Just who are you?"
"...Are you attempting to buy yourself time, Xiera?"
"Administrator's authority, emergency activation! Limiters unlocked!"
"Labrys!"
"Tsukuriyo!"
"Deflected...?!"
"These people are...!"

"I said we merely came here to express our
thanks. Your uncouth reception is your own loss."
"Aaagh?!"
"Looks like it's time."
"Yes... This time, I wield my power for everyone."
"...What is this?! Our attacks aren't connecting...!"

"That's not it. They're landing, but being
absorbed..."
"Is this all you can offer? How unfortunate, we were only here to pay you a friendly visit, but..."
"You've hardly put up any resistance... Perhaps I should put an end to all of you now."
"This is..."

"I fired from your blind spot but you barely
flinched. Very fitting for the Goddess of Demise. Can someone with your powers even be damaged?"
"And yet, we did inflict injury. We can fight."
"...I see. Only the soul was swapped with the vessel. The dream of the Akashic Record was true, after all?"
"Hahah, however, it is only pitifully clinging to life."
"...Very well, we shall leave the introductions at that."
"Listen well, world."
"I am the Goddess of Demise, Shiva. I was once sacrificed for your sake."
"Therefore, you will all become sacrifices for my sake this time."
"Vessel of the world, born of the Akashic Record. <%me>. I will destroy you, and destroy the world."
"One born of the beginning, and one born of the end."
"Not even the Akashic Record could reveal the victor."
